Name: The Fabled Magnetic Cube Mechanics - I
Description: The nagging engineer Mizhi always mentions hearing a mysterious sound calling him...
QuestDesc: The nagging engineer Mizhi always mentions hearing a mysterious sound calling him...

Dialogues.Speaker: Rambling and Wandering Engineer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Magnetic Cube frequency... proton radius... spin quantum number... suspension dynamics...

Dialogues.Speaker: Rambling and Wandering Engineer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm in the pursue of the ultimate Magnetic Cube Mechanics... it's just I'm met with some bottleneck.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rambling and Wandering Engineer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The ultimate Mechanics is calling me from inside the pit. It's so close, yet so unreachable...

Options.PlotLineKey: Why don't you go in there?

Dialogues.Speaker: Rambling and Wandering Engineer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ha, can't you see I'm obstructed?

Dialogues.Speaker: Rambling and Wandering Engineer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You see the block here? Someone locked the entrace with a puzzle.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rambling and Wandering Engineer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Is this how far I, the great Mi'zhi can go?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, I will not stagnate on the path to the ultimate Magnetic Cube Mechanics! And you, your presence here must be the turning point!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, you! The destined tide-turner!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why hesitate?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No. Engineers don't trap people! Look, this is my identification.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait, please...

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you can help me overcome this, you will be rewarded the access to treasure!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Shiny, sparkly, authentic treasure!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As you know, treasure means nothing to me. What only interests me is Magnetic Cube Mechanics.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Refreshingly answered!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You don't think I'm going to cheat, do you? To assure you even more, I work here. You can always come and find me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All right that's the deal. Let's go, we'll see the puzzle.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Solve the puzzles, and that block will disappear. Then I'll be able to enter.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You see that suspended Magnetic Cube? Just move it into the right places.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Simple, isn't it? You can do this. Give it a try.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Impressive! Your technique and efficiency are just like those of an engineer who studies these mechanics for a living!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you can keep on solving them like this, the remaining two won't take much time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Puzzles solved faster than 99% of existing attempts... {PlayerName}, you're indeed the chosen!

Options.PlotLineKey: How did you know my name?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, this puzzle records the challengers' ID. I just checked up from the backend.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And I saw the playback of your actions. They were just... brilliant!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If I wasn't so dying to enter the pit, I should sit right here and have a session with you about the design and solving of Magnetic Cube Mechanics.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, thank you for the help. I'll send you the reward. Take some rest.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When I find the ultimate Magnetic Cube Mechanics, I'll call you in for the treasure.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rest assured. When I find the ultimate Magnetic Cube Mechanics, I'll call you in for the treasure.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just a little patience is all you need.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Woah, you're are fast learner.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Only one left. Let's get it done!
